name: 4CHAN DARK(Tech Green)*CAPTCHA UPDATE*
description:
***Base stylish theme coding from: http://userstyles.org/styles/15867***
******Edits and help from Saxamaphone: http://userstyles.org/users/34740*****
*********Please visit these pages and view related styles and extensions.*********


--Text boards need some work (Use the boards "Terminal" style for best look)--
--This is buggy with a few of the other chan pages--




Changelog:

7/20: Center font color changed (finally) thanks Saxamaphone.
7/21: Edited postbox, bottom nav bar, and some size margins. Shouldn't be buggy while using greasemonkey or any extensions anymore.
7/23: Black bar on top left from the "buzzfeed" box is gone, added a few more lines to adblock.
7/26: Fixed a few odd colors on the front page, a few more pixels moved around.
8/01: Styled captcha, resized thread watcher and thread updater with updated version of 4chan X extention. 
8/08: Quick Reply function fixed for 4CHAN X extension.

Want a matching or similar firefox persona? Try this: https://www.getpersonas.com/en-US/persona/230290
